com.google.android.exoplayer

Class CodecCounters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.CodecCounters

  • public final class CodecCounters
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains codec event counts, for debugging purposes only.

    Counters should be written from the playback thread only. Counters may be read from any thread. To ensure that the counter values are correctly reflected between threads, users of this class should invoke ensureUpdated() prior to reading and after writing.

    • Method Detail

      • ensureUpdated

        public void ensureUpdated()
        Should be invoked from the playback thread after the counters have been updated. Should also be invoked from any other thread that wishes to read the counters, before reading. These calls ensure that counter updates are made visible to the reading threads.

      • getDebugString

        public java.lang.String getDebugString()
